name: Pidmon
description: Piddomon is a variation of Angemon with Angemon's blue-coloring changed to red, due to the color's association with passion and Piddomon's Cupid inspiration. Humanoid in body and covered in holy white clothing, it has two, white, feathery wings commonly associated with angels. It has long blond hair, and its upper face is covered with a mask. The DigiCode on its ribbons reads デジタルモンスター ( デジタルモンスター , Dejitaru Monsutā ? , lit. "Digital Monster") .
